feature -- Agent functions.
f_set_focus_event_translate_agent../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_set_focus_event_translate_agentSet_focus_event_translate_agent: FalseFUNCTION [FalseINTEGER_32, FalsePOINTER, FalseTUPLE] -- Translation agent used for set-focus events once Result := agent (n: FalseINTEGER_32; p: FalsePOINTER): FalseTUPLE do Result := [{../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_value_pointergtk_value_pointer (p)] end end

f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Destroy Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed := True end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_marshal../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_marshalmarshal (action: FalsePROCEDURE; n_args: FalseINTEGER_32; args: FalsePOINTER) -- Call action with GTK+ event data from args. -- There are n_args GtkArg*s in args. -- Called by C function c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal. require action_not_void: action /= Void n_args_not_negative: n_args >= 0 args_not_null: n_args > 0 implies args /= Falsedefault_pointer local retry_count: FalseINTEGER_32 l_integer_pointer_tuple: detachable like ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_integer_pointer_tupleInteger_pointer_tuple app_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_application_imp.xmlEV_APPLICATION_IMP do if retry_count = 0 then if n_args > 0 then l_integer_pointer_tuple := ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_integer_pointer_tupleInteger_pointer_tuple l_integer_pointer_tuple.integer := n_args l_integer_pointer_tuple.pointer := args end action.Falsecall (l_integer_pointer_tuple) elseif retry_count = 1 then app_imp ?= (create {../interface/ev_environment.xmlEV_ENVIRONMENT}).../interface/ev_environment.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_environment_i.xml#f_application_iapplication_i check app_imp /= Void then end app_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xml#f_on_exception_actionon_exception_action (app_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xml#f_new_exceptionnew_exception) end rescue retry_count := retry_count + 1 if retry_count = 1 then retry else Falseprint ("Error: An exception was raised when during handling of a previous exception%N") end end
feature {NONE} -- Tuple optimizations.
f_internal_dimension_tuple../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_internal_dimension_tupleInternal_dimension_tuple: FalseTUPLE [x: FalseINTEGER_32; y: FalseINTEGER_32; width: FalseINTEGER_32; height: FalseINTEGER_32] -- Once function used for global access of dimension tuple. once create Result end
f_internal_key_tuple../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_internal_key_tupleInternal_key_tuple: FalseTUPLE [key: ../interface/ev_key.xmlEV_KEY; string: FalseSTRING_32; key_press: FalseBOOLEAN] -- Once function used for global access of key tuple. once create Result end
f_pointer_tuple../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_pointer_tuplePointer_tuple: FalseTUPLE [pointer: FalsePOINTER] once create Result end
f_integer_tuple../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_integer_tupleInteger_tuple: FalseTUPLE [integer: FalseINTEGER_32] once create Result end
f_integer_pointer_tuple../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_integer_pointer_tupleInteger_pointer_tuple: FalseTUPLE [integer: FalseINTEGER_32; pointer: FalsePOINTER] once create Result end

feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP, ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xmlEV_GTK_CALLBACK_MARSHAL} -- Externals
f_set_eif_oid_in_c_objectfrozen ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_set_eif_oid_in_c_objectset_eif_oid_in_c_object (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER; eif_oid: FalseINTEGER_32; c_object_dispose_address: FalsePOINTER) -- Store Eiffel object_id in gtk_object. -- Set up signal handlers. external "C macro use %"ev_any_imp.h%"" end
f_c_signal_connectfrozen ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_c_signal_connectc_signal_connect (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER; a_signal_name: FalsePOINTER; an_agent: FalsePROCEDURE; invoke_after_handler: FalseBOOLEAN): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Connect an_agent to 'a_signal_name' on a_c_object. external "C (GtkObject*, gchar*, EIF_OBJECT, gboolean): guint | %"ev_gtk_callback_marshal.h%"" alias "c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_signal_connect" end
f_c_signal_connect_truefrozen ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_c_signal_connect_truec_signal_connect_true (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER; a_signal_name: FalsePOINTER; an_agent: FalsePROCEDURE): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Connect an_agent to 'a_signal_name' on a_c_object. external "C (GtkObject*, gchar*, EIF_OBJECT): guint | %"ev_gtk_callback_marshal.h%"" alias "c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_signal_connect_true" end
